title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for April 2025
description: The bonus round solutions for April. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for April 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today throughout April 2025. We'll post the Fan Friday word as well.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of April 2025. As always, we’ll provide the answer to the final puzzle first and then list the solutions to the toss-ups and standard puzzles. We’ll continue to the update this post throughout the month on the daily. The theme for this week is iHeartRadio Week, so the puzzles should be related to music and pop culture. These solutions are for the syndicated show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, with tonight’s game featuring three new contestants: Ruby Brisco, Mora Taylor, and Jay Tope. (We’ll have a separate post for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune with Pat Sajak when it pops back on April 30.) Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for April 8. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, April 8, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – HITTING PAUSE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – TURN UP THE VOLUME [Phrase] Tossup #2 – BENEFIT CONCERT [Showbiz] Regular Puzzle #1 – RAP, ROCK & REGGAE [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – DON’T GO BREAKING MY HEART [Top 40 Hits of the ’70s] Regular Puzzle #3 – THE BEST SEATS IN THE HOSUE [Things] Tossup #3 – DOUBLE BACON BURGER [Food for Thought] Tossup #4 – YOU SAVED MY BACON [Food For Thought] Tossup #5 – KEVIN BACON [Food For Thought] Regular Puzzle #4 – A NIGHT TO REMEMBER [Event] Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, April 7: Bonus Round Puzzle – MAJOR VICTORY [Event] Tossup #1 – ONLY GIRL IN THE WORLD [Song Lyircs] Tossup #2 – BEST MUSIC VIDEO [Showbiz] Regular Puzzle #1 – THE HITS FROM COAST TO COAST [Quote] Regular Puzzle #2 – SCRATCHING POST MALONE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – YOU’RE MY BETTER HALF [Song Title] Tossup #3 – YELLOW SUBMARINE [Colorful Language] Tossup #4 – LITTLE RED CORVETTE [Colorful Language] Tossup #5 – PINK PONY CLUB [Colorful Language] Regular Puzzle #4 – NAILED IT [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, April 4: Bonus Round Puzzle – A NICE GROUP OF KIDS [People] Tossup #1 – BATTLE OF THE BANDS [Event] Tossup #2 – LITTLE ITALY [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #1 – ARCHAEOLOGICAL SITES [Places] Regular Puzzle #2 – MOTHER-IN-LAW OF THE JUNGLE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – SUN-KISSED SKY & COOL-BREEZES [Weather Report] Tossup #3 – RESEARCH THE LOCATION [Travel Tips] Tossup #4 – MAKE A DETAILED ITINERARY [Travel Tips] Tossup #5 – THROW YOUR PLANS OUT THE WINDOW [Travel Tips] Regular Puzzle #4 – EARNING BROWNIE POINTS [What Are You Doing?] Fan Friday – EUROPE Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, April 3: Bonus Round Puzzle – FAR BEHIND [Phrase] Tossup #1 – BURNING MAN [Fun Festivals] Tossup #2 – WOODSTOCK, NEW YORK [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #1 – FROZEN MARGARITA [Happy Hour] Regular Puzzle #2 – DANCING AROUND THE MAYPOLE [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #3 – PHOTOBOMBING A VACATIN PIC [Say Cheese!] Tossup #3 – SITTING ON THE COUCH [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – SITTING ON THE FLOOR [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – SITTING IN THE HOT SEAT [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – GAMES PEOPLE PLAY [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, April 2: Bonus Round Puzzle – BANQUET ROOM [Place] Tossup #1 – WE GOT THE GREEN LIGHT! [Colorful Language] Tossup #2 – SHOCK ABSORBERS [Things] Regular Puzzle #1 – THE SUNSHINE STATE OF THE ART [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – PHILADELPHIA EAGLES WIN SUPER BOWL [Headline] Regular Puzzle #3 – ICE-COLD ANYTHING! [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – RUNNING ERRANDS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – RUNNING OUT OF GAS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – RUNNING AWAY FROM MY PROBLEMS [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – DONE TO PERFECTION [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, April 1: Bonus Round Puzzle – PREVIOUS OCCUPANT [Person] Tossup #1 – I’M ALREADY PACKED! [Phrase] Tossup #2 – GYMNASTICS MEET [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – TASTE SOME FINE WINE AND FABULOUS FOOD [Travel Tip] Regular Puzzle #2 – NEW ORLEANS, LOUISIANA [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #3 – EXPLORING A NEW CITY [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – INTERRUPTING [Pet Peeve] Tossup #4 – CHEWING TOO LOUD [Pet Peeve] Tossup #5 – TALKING WITH FOOD IN YOUR MOUTH [Pet Peeve] Regular Puzzle #4 – POSING ON THE RED CARPET [Showbiz] Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, March 31: Bonus Round Puzzle – WHOOP IT UP [Phrase] Tossup #1 – EXPECT THE UNEXPECTED [Travel Tip] Tossup #2 – MODEL AIRPLANE KIT [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – RENAISSANCE FAIRE [Fun Festivals] Regular Puzzle #2 – ANIMAL, DECORATIONS, TIME, BUS [Crossword – Party ___] Regular Puzzle #3 – A TREMENDOUS ESCAPE [Event] Tossup #3 – RING ON MY FINGER [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – RING AROUND THE COLLAR [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – THREE-RING CIRCUS [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – DANCING IN THE DARK [Song Title] Colette is still sponsoring the Fan Friday contest. We’ll provide the Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes once it’s shown during April 4, 11, 18, and 25. The iHeartRadio Giveaway will be active between April 7 and April 10. If you enter the Bonus Round puzzle solution at the Wheel Watchers Club during those nights, you will have a chance to win VIP tickets to music events around the country. A similar contest called the Hawaiian Vacation Giveaway sponsored by Hilton will be available from April 14 to April 18.

Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of April 2025. As always, we’ll provide the answer to the final puzzle first and then list the solutions to the toss-ups and standard puzzles. We’ll continue to the update this post throughout the month on the daily.

The theme for this week is iHeartRadio Week, so the puzzles should be related to music and pop culture. These solutions are for the syndicated show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, with tonight’s game featuring three new contestants: Ruby Brisco, Mora Taylor, and Jay Tope. (We’ll have a separate post for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune with Pat Sajak when it pops back on April 30.) Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for April 8.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, April 8, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

Colette is still sponsoring the Fan Friday contest. We’ll provide the Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes once it’s shown during April 4, 11, 18, and 25.

The iHeartRadio Giveaway will be active between April 7 and April 10. If you enter the Bonus Round puzzle solution at the Wheel Watchers Club during those nights, you will have a chance to win VIP tickets to music events around the country.

A similar contest called the Hawaiian Vacation Giveaway sponsored by Hilton will be available from April 14 to April 18.
